text: “læa chaw yiw di klaw wa xu sayr pen butr khx ngxallxh læa chaw khrist di klaw wa xal-ma sih pen butr khx ngxallxh nan khux thxykha thi phwk khea klaw khun dwy pak khxng phwk khea xeng sung khlay kab thxykha khxng brrda phu thi di ptiseth kar sraththa ma kxn khx xallxh thrng laxnat phwk khea dwy theid phwk khea thuk hanhe pi di xyangri
